caption: I found that they were rude. Maybe stressed, but that’s no excuse. When I asked if I could please use the bathroom as there was a fire evacuation at our hotel, they turned me away. I said, I would be happy to buy something to take out, in …

I’ve been a chef for over 2 decades and for me to be as impressed as I was tonight with all Figidini had to offer, remarkable!  From the voice on the phone when making reservations, to Kevin on the bar and Franky, in the back making the …
Best Pizza in Rhode Island
Amazing as usual. Love this place. Never had a bad dish here.
Excellent selection of liquors, ranging from the familiar to the adventurous. And a very easy atmosphere to enjoy it all!
The best pizza! Unusual style but terrific. Other dishes are fabulous as well. Great staff...low key vibe.
Best pizza in Rhode Island!
Always amazing!

The atmosphere is cool but that doesn’t make up for the soggy, bland pizza. So many better places to go in RI for pizza. We were disappointed. Literally Had to eat the pizza with a spoon it was so wet.
AMAZING pizza! Everything else is amazing (drinks are inspired) too but the Margarita Extra pizza will haunt you.

I come to this superb restaurant from time to time because I enjoy the good mood that is part of this restaurant. The crew is highly welcoming and skilfull. The service is absolutely quick. Most important, the food you eat is magnificent. I …
Amazing pizza, delicious drinks and great atmosphere.

Pizza was awesome!!! Everything was delicious, but not a wide variety in the menu and it is expensive. It didn't meet the expectations I had from their ig. The place is tiny so at night out must be very crowded. I would go back for their pizza, though!
Best pizza I've had since I was in Naples!
Phenomenal experience. Best pizza I've had in the states! Thanks Cara!

Finally decided to give Figidini a try and boy was it worth it . The food was incredible. The flavors all just perfectly came together . Hands down best Mediterranean style cuisine I've ever tasted. Big bonus service was on point. Good for you guys please keep doing what you are doing because it totally works .
This place is awesome!

Wow! What a meal-- we sat down for a quick bite and found out we didn't mind lingering at all. Picked up two of the special and split a plate of grilled, stuffed figs. They were absolutely delicious and the wait staff was attentive but …
Michelin star worthy
best actual Neapolitan pizza (only pizza worth eating) I have had in the USA so far. Great homemade soda and fantastic service.
Definitely some of the best pizza I have ever had in my life- truly rivals Pizza I had in Italy!
The food here is always delicious. Nothing I have had of their menu has not been great.
We had the baked oysters, sirloin steak and the pizza with parma. Everything from food and service was top notch!
Good place to eat.

Absolutely amazing pizza. The dough is out of this world. The service is great and the owner who makes the pizza is always up for a chat and sharing his journey of pizza making.  Overall, this is one of the best if not THE best pie you will have in New England.
excellent food a little pricey but worth it
The sweet potato pizza is amazing. Too bad it's seasonal . It's loaded with bacon and the crust is so soft. I got it delivered as the location is not the greatest.
Love this little place. The Neopolitan pizza is just that, Neapolitan.  Hard to stop eating it.
Everything here is AMAZING. Try something new and you'll love it!!!!! Cannot explain how much I love this place!!!!
Adequate non pizza meals, chicken thighs left something to be desired.

Can't say enough about the experience! Seemed like each plate the 4 of us shared was better than the last. The thin crust, coal-fired pizza was equally fantastic and everything about the experience felt authentic to the cuisine. The service was extremely attentive and timely. We'll be back!
(Translated by Google) The best pizza in providence, with the burrata always fresh from Italy  (Original) La pizza più buona di providence, con la burrata sempre fresca dall italia
Excellent pizza, delicious, healthy and coal fire stove style. Really worth it. Recommend.
Great food, creative cocktails and excellent service!

Our favorite Napoli style pizzeria/Italian restaurant. Cara and Frankie are wonderful hosts. New Year Night is a must have if you are around. Highly recommend the Margarita Di Buffalo - closest to the best we've had in Naples, Italy.
My favorite pizza in PVD.
Food ia very delicious. Just feel like serving size could be a little better (proportioned) for the price. However definitely recommend this place.
The service was okay. Expensive. Can get the same great quality elsewhere. Mostly paying for the service and atmosphere. Went in a lunch time and no lunch menu.
Great service, cocktails, and wood fired pizza
Dome of the best and innovative good I've had in a long time. Wine okay but not on a par with the food.
Really good food here. Very good service. Very small. Plan ahead.
The intimate space, curious attention to detail and brilliant service showcase labor intense cuisine with charred attitude. Always my pleasure to dine at Figidini.
The mortadella and lemon pizza is divine! One of the best pizzas I have had!
Amazing artichokes!
A favorite!
Probably one of the most flavorable pizzas  I have ever had! Not your typical  type of pizza but a must try!
Amazing pizza for a great price! Must try... MORTADELA & LEMON
Love the food here and great mixed drinks too!

One of my favorite spots in Providence - I've been dozens and dozens of times. A special gem with unique and stellar pizza, cocktails, and small plates. A place I take visitors to show off the city. Go for dinner, go for lunch, go for drinks after work. It is just so, so good.
This place has amazing food! thin crust Pizzas to die for! Good cocktails and service, nice location too.
Food wasn’t as nice as you’d expect for the price but servers were nice
Wonderful fennel salad. Pizza always good!
First time to this area. Service was great . Pizza was great . Kevin the bartender was the best !!!
Wow, delicious pizza. A group of us shared three pizzas and they brought them out one at a time in perfect order of deliciousness.  Totally recommend this place!! Can't wait to go back with the kids.
Food was great! Staff was charming.

My wife and I went to Figidini because of its close proximity to the Biltmore. We weren't expecting a ton, given that its name didn't come up in our searches for best nearby restaurants, but we couldn't have been more pleased. The burrata …
Delicious pizza and great drink menu

A hidden gem on the Providence restaurant scene! The atmosphere is relaxed, food phenomenal and the craft cocktails outstanding. Especially enjoy sitting at the bar and with the local oysters as an appetizer!
Get food
Excellent

The best pizza I've had (spanning NYC, New Haven, Chicago). Neapolitan style, great ingredient choice, ad perfectly cooked. Great small plates as well, and a robust beer and cocktail selection. All at a decent price, if not cheap. Highly recommend it!
Good stone fired pizza
Awesome!!! thanks!

My husband and I had the most amazing, over the top delicious meal at Figidini. When we arrived we were greeted by the friendliest staff. We sat at the bar and ordered the creamed kale appetizer. I can’t even put into words how delicious it …
The best place to experience an amazing dining experience. You will never have pizza like this. My favorite restaurant, hands down.
Best pizza hands down! Don't forget to get a side of house pickles and ask about the dessert specials. YUM!
Pizza is excellent , great place for dinner before a PPAC show.
Best pizza I have had in Providence! It's a shame they won't let you order take out, so unfortunately the only way to enjoy it is on the rare occasion you have time to sit down and eat.
Delicious pizza, the njuda especially. Great small plates, specials and craft cocktails
Food and service were great!
Best pizza in Providence! Friendly staff, fast service and extremely high quality ingredients.  Get your fork and knife ready!
I liked this place a lot. The drinks were great and the pizza was tasty. Its a nice cozy place with the wood burning fire creating an outdoorsy feel.
I've been here twice and loved it both times. Drinks and Food are both above average.

Kevin, the bartender, is the man! He made some awesome drinks and was approachable. We had a great time talking with him. We learned a lot about the neighborhood and Rhode Island. Try the chicken thighs with fennel and citrus and ask for the hot sauce on the side.
I can't say enough about this place. Go, try the boneless chicken thighs.
Awesome pizza.
You will have to go to Napoli to find a better Pizza. Maybe.
Great menu, delicious pizza

Lovely atmosphere with quality ingredients, food and drink. You can tell they give attention to the culinary arts and food prep by their menu and attention to detail. While they call their food small plates, you actually receive substantial portion sizes. Overall, a very pleasant and enjoyable place.

Great place for pizzas . My girlfriend and I had the Margarita Extra that has bufilina mozzerala and the 00 flour makes it so light and crispy.  I'm hungry again for it just writing this review. Great Pizza
love the pizza here.  the crust is delicious.
Turned away at 1043 pm update your hours.
Great Pizza, duck special was good, calamari was on the chewy side was not breaded how I prefer it ama was topple that upon ordering. Staff was excellent.
Very good quality, unique flavor combinations, but not cheap.  4-slice speciality pizza for $18.

In a world of fast food pizza...Figidini is the polar opposite. Simply the best pizza I have ever had in a fine dining setting. The service  is outstanding & the chef is making the best pizza's this side of the planet. Not to mention all of the other great tapas & desserts. Exquisite!

My boyfriend and I picked this place randomly when we were in town for a conference. We got there a little before 5, so enjoyed some killer cocktails while waiting for the dinner menu to switch over. It was absolutely worth the wait! Being …
I've never had a bad meal here. Chicken thighs are a must, get them with the homemade hot sauce. My fave pizza is the ricotta one. I pay extra for the hot honey to dip the crust in!
DO NOT EAT HERE! Watered down, pretentious pizza. Horrible waitress, terrible

Salad with goat cheese... amazing.  Scallops, fingerlings with zucchini were casually crafted, with a fullness of flavor that there simple presentation belied. 10 tables, 12 bar chairs... comfortably small, with three of those tops outside.  A satisfying meal.  The S African shiraz is a good match

Food was good, drinks were good, prices were ok, atmosphere was cool. Bartenders and servers were very nice and not at all pretentious or snooty, although I couldn't help but laugh when they tried to explain how to use the "special" cutlery. Overall decent place with good product. $50 for pizza and drinks.

My husband and I sat at the bar when we visited Figidini's. The bartender was extremely personable and gave great suggestions. I started off with a signature cocktail and my husband started with a draft beer. Colin, the bartender, was …
Try the chicken or steak tips with potatoes 👌👌👌

This place is fantastic. Wonderful service, excellent food. Well priced, considering the quality- the flour is imported from Naples. Some dishes are a little bit funky (tandoori rabbit leg with purple carrots, for example) but still really …
Best pizza in town.
Food was good, but that doesn't make up for the snooty waitress and high prices.  "We don't serve bread" was just one comment we received.
